_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
_notes: 0DTE iron butterfly â€” same-day expiry. Update YYMMDD to today's date. SPY ~600, adjust strikes to current ATM.
notes: SPY 0DTE iron butterfly 595/600/600/605, same-day expiry. Tight wings for max premium collection.
rationale: 0DTE iron fly: max theta decay, price expected to pin near 600. High gamma risk managed by tight wings ($5 wide). Target 50% profit or close by 2:30 PM ET.

entry_conditions.directional_regime: Flat â€” no strong trend intraday
entry_conditions.time_of_day: Enter between 9:45 AM - 11:00 AM ET (let opening volatility settle)
entry_conditions.notes: 0DTE iron butterfly is a high-conviction theta play. Very profitable when market is range-bound but VERY high gamma risk near expiry. Use tight wings ($5) to limit max loss. Close at 50% profit or by 2:30 PM ET to avoid pin risk. Never hold to expiry.

pnl_drivers.max_profit: Net credit received (ATM put + ATM call premium minus wing cost). Typically $3-5 per contract on SPY.
pnl_drivers.max_loss: Wing width ($5) - net credit. Typically $1.50-2.50 per contract.
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Theta decay â€” 0DTE options lose ALL time value today. Fastest theta of any DTE.
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: Price pin â€” SPY has known 0DTE pin behavior due to dealer gamma hedging

greeks_profile.theta: EXTREMELY positive â€” 0DTE ATM options have maximum theta, decay accelerates intraday
greeks_profile.vega: negative but less relevant â€” IV changes matter less with 0 days left
greeks_profile.delta: near zero at entry â€” but changes RAPIDLY (high gamma)
greeks_profile.gamma: EXTREMELY negative â€” this is the key risk. Small price move = large delta change. Must manage actively.

risk_management.time_stop: Close by 2:30 PM ET regardless of P&L
risk_management.adjustment: If tested on one side, roll untested wing closer to collect more credit. Or close for loss if breach is decisive.

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: SPY opens, settles into a range after first 30 min. Enter iron fly at 600 ATM. Theta melts premium all day. Close at 50% profit by early afternoon. Repeat next session.
